sen.e: SAKATA no Ikazuchi (the year of birth is unclear - in September, 676) was a person of the Asuka era.

sen.e: It was mentioned that SAKATA no Kimi Ikazuchi died and due to his success in the year of Mizunoe-Saru (according to the Oriental Zodiac), he was honored with the rank of Daishi in that document in September, 676.
